expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Reference:
Rolfe CJ, Hughes PD, Fenton CR, Schnabel C, Xu S, Brown AG, 2012. Paired 26Al and 10Be exposure ages from Lundy: new evidence for the extent and timing of Devensian glaciation in the southern British isles. Quaternary Science Reviews 43, 61-73.

Data comments:
Latitudes and longitudes based on map figures and Google Earth.
Sampling year assumed to be 2010.

expage.github.io
